name: Farmin
description:
Farmin is my submission to the Game Makers Toolkit Game Jam 2020, and my first Game Jam creation ever! As assumed everything was made since Friday at 2:00 pm (GMT-5) except for the audio. 

All audio was found on www.freesound.org and audionautix.com.

The topic was "Out of Control" for this jam and what my girlfriend and I came up with was to has a farm where you grow crops, but animals want to eat them. The reason we believe this fits the "Out of Control" theme is because the only way to stop the animals from devouring your livelihood is with your trusty herding dog, Shelby, that will stay within a certain distance of you, the farmer. 

There is one twist though, if Shelby isn't pet frequently enough then she wanders farther and farther away leaving your crops stranded. Hopefully you can keep up  with Shelby and still make enough money selling crops to hold onto your farm before the bank takes your land, dog, and animals away.
